alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Howell; Ozark; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 10:52AM CDT until April 13 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR OZARK...EASTERN DOUGLAS...HOWELL AND SOUTHERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 1051 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Houston to Price Place, moving northeast at 90 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Plains... Bull Shoals Lake... Mountain View... Willow Springs... Cabool... Houston... Gainesville... Pomona... Summersville... Raymondville... Theodosia... South Fork... Pontiac... Sundown... Price Place... Brixey... Willhoit... Tecumseh... Pottersville... Caulfield... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
